  • Notice Board

Notice Board¶

The Notice Board serves two primary purpose, sending information to Users and also creating FAQ items, to create an FAQ item, when you create a notice set the Page to FAQ. To create or manage the notice board log in to your admin account and point your web browser to http://yourdomain.com/admin/notice_board where yourdomain.com is your actual domain name.

T create a new notice, click the Create New Notice button To edit an existing notice, click the Edit button on the notice you want to edit To delete an existing notice, click the Delete button on the notice you want to delete
